DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : Considering increase elderly population life expectancy , together expansion Nordic walking ( NW ) intervention train method elderly , need preventive study RCTs methodological good quality approach enable physical education , health rehabilitation professional make decision regard type , volume intensity NW exercise promote health sedentary elderly . Objectives : The aim study evaluate , randomize clinical trial , effect eight week NW FW training quality life ( QoL ) , static balance , dynamic variability , self-selected treadmill walk speed ( SSWSTreadmill ) , Locomotor rehabilitation ( LRI ) Parameters Pendular Mechanism ( external , internal total mechanical work -Wext , Wint , Wtot , Recovery -R , Cost Transport - C ) , Electromyographic parameter ( Average signal co-contraction AD , TB , VL , BF , AT MG muscle ) , heart rate exercise - HRexercise rate perceive exertion ( RPE ) , sedentary elderly . sedentary elderly . Experimental Design : Randomized Controlled Clinical Trial ( RCT ) . Study Site : School Physical Education , Physiotherapy Dance ( ESEFID ) , Federal University Rio Grande Sul Porto Alegre , Rio Grande Sul , Brazil . Methods : The sample comprise 33 sedentary participant randomly divide two group ( Nordic walk group Free walk group perform train 8 week .
